d:
A silly comic about sexy fairies and naughty tentacles. Created by Eldrik Aethervial.

Hello, I am Sokaras (go by Kimvanjo on e-hentai). I am mod on the "Fairies vs Tentacles" discord server as well as help with the comic's website. Was tasked by the author Eldrik (a.k.a. Bobbydando) to take over uploading the comic on e-hentai galleries.

Comic is usually updated 4 times per month, every Monday.

Fairies vs Tentacles website:
https://eldrikdgt.com/fvt/

Other sites:

Newgrounds - https://eldrik.newgrounds.com/

Note: Pixiv requires to censor genitals in the pictures
